records.name: Oblu Nature Helengeli-all-inclusive With Free Transfers

descriptions.general: This fabulous resort boasts a simply magnificent setting on a secluded island in the Maldives, surrounded by untouched white sand beaches, azure water, and lush tropical vegetation. During their stay at the resort the guests will be given the chance to experience the natural beauty of the Maldives at its best. Visitors might take excursions to uninhabited nearby islands, go scuba diving and snorkelling in the unspoilt reefs surrounding the island, and relax with a Swedish, Thai, or aromatherapy massage in the spa. In addition to spacious, air-conditioned bungalows, the resort also boasts its own dive school with multi-lingual PADI diving instructors and a bright, cosy restaurant serving a rich and varied breakfast buffet, exotic oriental dishes, and the occasional beach barbeque. The unique charm of this secluded Maldivian island will captivate each guest as soon as he sets foot on the beautiful beach.

records.short_description: Comfortable resort with 116 rooms, outdoor pool and shuttle service
